attributes.action: halt all immigration due to projected rising sea levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the push of the Green agenda and the concerns of rising sea levels, surely as a small island we must stop immigration to avoid a future catastrophe. Scientific maps indicate a much smaller future land mass for the population. Stop all immigration now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
